Probando
```{r, echo=FALSE}
  library(leaflet)
  m <- leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
    addMarkers(lng=13.3886, lat=52.5172,
      popup="Ich bin hier")
  m  # Print the map

  city=read.csv("/home/calcita/myblog/Insumos_blog/city_latlon.csv")
  addPolylines(m, lng = city$Longitude, lat =city$Latitude, layerId = NULL, group = NULL,
  stroke = TRUE, color = "#03F", weight = 2.5, opacity = 0.5,
  fill = FALSE, fillColor = "blue", fillOpacity = 0.2, dashArray = NULL,
  smoothFactor = 1, noClip = FALSE, popup = NULL, popupOptions = NULL,
  label = NULL, labelOptions = NULL, options = pathOptions(),
  highlightOptions = NULL, data = getMapData(m))
  
#probar esto  
  leaflet() %>% addTiles()%>%addMarkers(data=city,popup=~City)%>% 
    setView(m,lng=city$Longitude[5],lat=city$Latitude[5],zoom=4.5)%>% 
  addPolylines(city$Longitude,city$Latitude)

```
